AUTHORIZED PARTNERS

Partnership Benefits

Direct manufacturer relationships deliver better value for your projects

Competitive Pricing

Direct vendor pricing typically reserved for large distributors. Better margins mean better prices for your commercial projects.

Technical Support

Direct access to manufacturer technical support, training, and product specialists. Expert assistance when you need it.

Latest Technology

Early access to new products and technologies. Stay current with the latest advances in commercial security.

Factory Training

Our technicians receive ongoing factory training and certification ensuring proper installation and service.

Major Partners

Industry-leading manufacturers and their specialties

Allegion Family

Complete door hardware ecosystem

Brands & Specialties:

Schlage

Commercial locksets, electronic locks, and access control solutions

Von Duprin

Exit devices, panic hardware, and fire-rated solutions

LCN

Door closers, automatic operators, and specialty hardware

ASSA ABLOY Group

Premium security solutions

Brands & Specialties:

Corbin Russwin

Institutional locksets and high-security hardware

Sargent

Commercial grade locksets and access control

Medeco

High-security cylinders and restricted keyways

Specialty Partners

Specialized products for complete solutions

HES (Hanchett Entry Systems)

Electric strikes, magnetic locks, and access control hardware for secure openings.

Securitron

Electromagnetic locks, exit devices, and access control accessories for high-security applications.

Pemko

Weatherstripping, thresholds, and door bottom seals for energy efficiency and weather protection.

McKinney

Heavy-duty hinges and specialty hardware for high-traffic commercial applications.

Keedex

Door edge guards, latch guards, and security enhancement products.

Centrios

Smart locks and connected security solutions for modern access control.

What our manufacturer relationships mean for your project

Direct Benefits

  • ✓ Priority access to products and technical support
  • ✓ Factory training for our installation team
  • ✓ Warranty support directly from manufacturers

Project Advantages

  • ✓ Single-source responsibility for complete solutions
  • ✓ Coordinated delivery and installation schedules
  • ✓ Comprehensive technical documentation
  • ✓ Ongoing service and support relationships

Certifications & Training

Professional expertise backed by manufacturer certification

Factory Certified Technicians

Our installation team maintains current certifications from all major partners ensuring proper installation and service.

Ongoing Training Programs

Regular participation in manufacturer training programs keeps us current with new products and technologies.

Technical Specifications

Deep product knowledge and specification expertise to ensure proper hardware selection for your application.

Code Compliance

Current knowledge of fire codes, ADA requirements, and local building codes for compliant installations.
